mapper.insert: INSERT INTO poster_archive (project_no, file_name, file_url, visual_prompt, style_name, create_at) VALUES (#{projectNo}, #{fileName}, #{fileUrl}, #{visualPrompt}, #{styleName}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT file_path_no as filePathNo, project_no as projectNo, file_name as fileName, file_url as fileUrl, visual_prompt as visualPrompt, style_name as styleName, create_at as createAt FROM poster_archive WHERE file_path_no = #{filePathNo}
SELECT file_path_no as filePathNo, file_path_no as posterPromptNo, visual_prompt as visualPrompt FROM poster_archive WHERE project_no = #{projectNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE poster_archive SET file_url = #{fileUrl}, visual_prompt = #{visualPrompt}, create_at = NOW() WHERE file_path_no = #{filePathNo}
